DOC.brief_title: Non-inferiority Trial Assess Safety Performance Evolution Coronary Stent

If CK MB > 2× upper limit normal ( ULN ) , patient exclude regardless CK Total . 2 . If CK Total > 2× ULN , either CKMB troponin must draw patient exclude either CKMB troponin abnormal . 3 .
